```{r 2}
months_vector <- c("March","April","January","November","January",
"September","October","September","November","August",
"January","November","November","February","May","August", "July","December","August","August","September","November","February",
"April")

factor_months <- factor(months_vector)
factor_months

assign("factor_months_vector", factor_months)

print(factor_months_vector)

```

```{r 3}
summary(months_vector)
summary(factor_months_vector)
#Yes of course, so it is easy accessible the data basic information of the table given such as; its length, class, mode, and how many are the each elements.
```

```{r }
number <- 1:50
readline(prompt = "Enter a number from 1-50: ", number)
if (number <= 50){
  cat("TRUE - ", number)
} else if (number > 50){
  cat('“The number selected is beyond the range of 1 to 50”')
} else {
  print("Invalid Input")
}
```
